title: account
name: account
description: BETA An account to track times, expenses, projects, usages, etc. Those are single entry accounts, opposed to double entry accounting in bookkeeping accounts.

number.description: Unique number assigned by you or if empty SK account number schema.

balance.description: The account balance is the sum of all entries, also those from sub-accounts.

budget.description: If an account is used to track budgetary things f.ex. projects, this fields can be used to perform calculations like: Are we still inside the allowed budget?

default_price.description: The default price single for new account entries, if price single is empty on create. Max 6 decimal places.

default_unit.description: The default quantity unit for new account entries, if unit is empty on create.

hide_fields.description: A list of account entry field names. The fields are hidden on account entry lists and forms so one can focus on the important inputs. For example hide: tax,description,billed_at

contact_id.description: The contacts uuid to which the account is related.

document_id.description: Document uuid, related to the account.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

creator_id.description: The user uuid who created the record.

filter[q].title: Search
filter[q].description: Wildcard search in number, name, description

filter[balance_from].title: By balance from
filter[balance_from].description: Find account with a balance greater(>=) than given number.

filter[balance_to].title: By balance to
filter[balance_to].description: Find accounts with a balance smaller(<=) than given number.

filter[contact_ids].title: Contacts
filter[contact_ids].description: Find objects belonging to a single or a list of contacts, use ids comma separated.

filter[parent_id].title: By parent
filter[parent_id].description: Search children of the given account.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 50, max is 200

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
